title: Pixel 2XL UI randomly unresponsive
content:
Hi Pixel Team,

I've recently purchased a Pixel 2 XL and been experiencing this issue for about 3 times a day randomly. 
The UI was just unresponsive, I usually couldn't click anything on the screen but the physical buttons. Sometimes during that I could click some items but the screen responded really slowly. This issue would go away in about a minute, looks like there was some kind of performance spike. 

Here are 2 videos describing the issue: https://photos.app.goo.gl/yu39fzw3Skjs362B6

Things I've tried but they didn't help:
0. Update system to latest version (until 2020 February security update)
1. Restart
2. Factory Reset
3. Reduce or increase Pointer Speed
3. Use another launcher instead of Pixel Launcher

Please take a look because this affects user experience badly.
Thank you.
